description: This file is a Yocto recipe (.inc) defining how to build, configure, install, and package Vim (Vi IMproved). It specifies metadata, dependencies, build steps, patches, configuration options, and packaging details for the Vim software in a Yocto build environment.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Prepares the build system by cleaning auto-generated files, running autoreconf tools, and configuring the source with autotools.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Performs the compilation, including initializing localization files and invoking autotools compilation.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the compiled Vim, adjusts permissions, installs example configurations, and handles platform-specific tweaks.
